item.title: Join the Exciting $100,000 AI Challenge by LMSYS and Kaggle!
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: LMSYS and Kaggle have joined forces for an epic competition: predicting human preferences with machine learning! This competition aims to use machine learning to better understand how humans make choices, which can help improve AI technologies. Winners walk away with a cool $100,000. item.content:encoded:

item.title: OpenAI Sora: World’s First Commissioned Music Video by AI
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: OpenAI Sora is again in the limelight with its first commissioned Music Video. After the release of The Balloon Man in ‘Air Head’ – a short film made with Sora, Hollywood’s fascination with this text-to-video model soared to new heights. item.title: World’s First Autonomous Car Race Held at Abu Dhabi’s Yas Marina
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Can you imagine a car race without any drivers? Well, it’s no longer imagination, but a reality now! That’s right, the world witnessed the first-ever professional autonomous car race over the weekend. item.title: Meet Victoria Shi, the World’s First AI-Generated Foreign Minister
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Ukraine has embarked on a pioneering venture by introducing the world’s first ‘AI diplomat’. The country has developed an artificial intelligence (AI) generated spokesperson to be the face and voice of their Ministry of Foreign Affairs. The AI, named Victoria Shi, has been launched to announce updates on various fronts, on behalf of the Ukrainian […]
item.content:encoded:
Ukraine has embarked on a pioneering venture by introducing the world’s first ‘AI diplomat’. The country has developed an artificial intelligence (AI) generated spokesperson to be the face and voice of their Ministry of Foreign Affairs. The AI, named Victoria Shi, has been launched to announce updates on various fronts, on behalf of the Ukrainian […]

item.title: Med-Gemini : A New AI Model Reaching 91.1% Accuracy in Medical Diagnostics
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Researchers from Google and DeepMind have introduced Med-Gemini, a new generation of AI models specifically tailored for medical applications. Building on the strengths of the 2023 Gemini models renowned for language processing, multimodal understanding, and long-context reasoning, Med-Gemini significantly enhances these capabilities for healthcare applications. Med-Gemini’s superiority is demonstrated through evaluation on 14 medical benchmarks, […]
item.content:encoded:
Researchers from Google and DeepMind have introduced Med-Gemini, a new generation of AI models specifically tailored for medical applications. Building on the strengths of the 2023 Gemini models renowned for language processing, multimodal understanding, and long-context reasoning, Med-Gemini significantly enhances these capabilities for healthcare applications. Med-Gemini’s superiority is demonstrated through evaluation on 14 medical benchmarks, […]

The post Med-Gemini : A New AI Model Reaching 91.1% Accuracy in Medical Diagnostics appeared first on Analytics Vidhya.

item.title: ChatGPT’s New ‘Memory’ Feature Enhances Personalized Interactions
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: OpenAI has added a new ‘Memory’ feature for ChatGPT Plus subscribers. It allows the AI-powered chatbot to remember and utilize personalized information shared during conversations. This enhancement aims to streamline personalized interactions and improve the overall experience of using ChatGPT.
